meta.description: Version-controlled credits for uDOS libraries and dependencies

editors.name: Micro Editor
editors.author: Zachary Yedidia
editors.description: Modern and intuitive terminal-based text editor

markdown_docs.name: Typo Markdown Editor
markdown_docs.author: Ross Robino
markdown_docs.description: Clean markdown editor with live preview and .udos.md support

markdown_docs.name: URL to Markdown
markdown_docs.author: uDOS Wizard Server
markdown_docs.description: Convert web pages to Markdown format

markdown_docs.name: MarkdownDB
markdown_docs.author: Datopian
markdown_docs.description: SQL-based Markdown file database for structured content queries

markdown_docs.name: Marp
markdown_docs.author: Marp Team
markdown_docs.description: Markdown presentation ecosystem - create slides with Markdown

markdown_docs.name: Markdown to PDF
markdown_docs.author: uDOS Wizard Server
markdown_docs.description: Convert Markdown documents to PDF format

voice_audio.name: Handy STT
voice_audio.author: CJ Pais
voice_audio.description: Free, open source speech-to-text application. Completely offline using Whisper or Parakeet models.

voice_audio.name: Piper TTS
voice_audio.author: OHF Voice
voice_audio.license_note: Original rhasspy/piper was MIT, new OHF-Voice fork is GPL-3.0
voice_audio.description: Fast, local neural text-to-speech system. Supports 30+ languages with natural-sounding voices.

ai_ml.name: Mistral Vibe CLI
ai_ml.author: Mistral AI
ai_ml.description: Mistral's open-source CLI coding assistant. Interactive AI agent for codebase exploration, modification, and development tasks.

ai_ml.name: Songscribe
ai_ml.author: Gabe Serna
ai_ml.description: Turn any song into sheet music. ML-powered instrument separation, audio-to-MIDI conversion, and score generation.

ai_ml.name: Gemini CLI
ai_ml.author: uDOS Wizard Server
ai_ml.description: Google Gemini AI assistant for terminal

ai_ml.name: Ollama Local AI
ai_ml.author: uDOS Dev
ai_ml.description: Run LLMs locally - offline AI for uDOS Vibe CLI. No cloud, no API keys, full privacy.

forms.name: GTX Form
forms.author: Community
forms.description: Typeform-style form builder with React and Vite

games.name: NetHack
games.author: uDOS Wizard Server
games.description: Classic roguelike dungeon crawler with ASCII graphics

networking.name: MeshCore Mesh Networking
networking.author: uDOS Wizard Server
networking.description: P2P mesh networking for offline device communication

wizard_library.name: Home Assistant
wizard_library.author: Home Assistant
wizard_library.description: Open-source home automation platform with local control and privacy focus

retro_influences.name: Teletext/Ceefax
retro_influences.influence: Tile-based information display, 40-column layouts, block graphics

retro_influences.name: BBC Micro
retro_influences.influence: Mode 7 teletext graphics, educational computing philosophy

retro_influences.name: Commodore 64
retro_influences.influence: PETSCII character graphics, retro color palettes

retro_influences.name: AmigaOS
retro_influences.influence: Workbench aesthetics, copper bars, four-color schemes

groovebox.description: Audio synthesis and data transmission using MML (Music Macro Language)

imperial_sounds.name: Imperial Data Transport
imperial_sounds.author: uDOS Team
imperial_sounds.description: Dark synth sounds for acoustic data transfer - mathematically generated, no external samples

mml_standard.name: Music Macro Language (MML)
mml_standard.description: Standard music notation format from 1970s-80s home computers
